attributes.action: Allow male to be a member of the Brownies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel men should be allowed to join the Brownies. At the moment you could argue theres a great deal of sexistness in Brownies. Currently no men are allowed whilst women are allowed to join scouts. I feel this is unfair a many men would enjoy baking cookies. In conclusion i feel you should allow men to join the Brownies to help reduce sexistness in our community

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
